footer.CERTIFICATE: We are certified under the NOM ISO 9001:2015 to achieve adequate processes that fulfil the highest standards for our clients, including the assessment, design, production, distribution, tooling and even materials.

us.LAG: Lagalm Industrial is a company with a wide experience at the process of design and manufacture of plastic parts at plastic injection. We have a group of young and creative collaborators, committed with the total satisfaction of their clients and commercial partners. We offer integral solutions that make us flexible in a changing and more challenging and demanding market of high quality products.
us.SOLUTIONS: We have different available services for each stage of your project, from the design, measuring, manufacture to logistics, delivering your merchandise at your own company throughout a constant communication with our clients.

services.LAGSERVICES: As an added value offered by LAGALM Industrial,
services.SERVICES: within the maquila of plastic products, there is a machine shop and tools with numerical control technology to provide corrective or preventive maintenance to the production tooling.
